>
[Aether Marble](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2416)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 75</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Aether marbles create violent, lingering eddies of force that extend partially into unseen planes. When the bomb explodes, it deals the listed force damage and force [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage. Many aether marbles grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

 Surfaces in the splash area are filled with twisting eddies of force, which are difficult terrain for [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures but not for corporeal ones. The force eddies in a square disperse after an incorporeal creature enters the square.
